titles.title: I was seeking You among the stars

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I was seeking You among the stars,
Among the colors of flowering fields.
I was looking for You at the time of thunderstorms
And the radiance of sunny days.
I was looking for You but not there!
You whispered softly from the inside,
In my heart sounded the soft voice:
«My dear child, look at the soul!»

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
"I am with you always, I'm at the heart.
Call only Me, - I will come in love!"

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
You were there, my God, always
Watching me, You waited quietly.
And when I sought You,
You showed me the right way.
I looked for You - and I found,
You whispered softly from the inside,
In my heart sounded the soft voice:
«My dear child, look at the soul!»
